function.name: average_batting_score
function.description: Get the average batting score of a cricketer for specified past matches. Note that the provided function is in Python 3 syntax.

matches.description: Number of past matches to consider for average calculation.

match_format.description: Format of the cricket matches considered (e.g., 'T20', 'ODI', 'Test'). Default is 'T20'.
